title: SOLD  1889 A35 Goodwin Round Charlie Comiskey
author: YazFenway08

posts.post_title: SOLD  1889 A35 Goodwin Round Charlie Comiskey
posts.post_content:
really sharp example of this hall of famer.  beautiful color and registration. eyelet is intact. faint creasing near the eyelet and at the top above his hat.  otherwise the surface is very clean…couple of light toning spots.  reverse has some light toning as seen

$995/obo

payment net PayPal.  shipping included
